title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Bouches-du-Rhône, France
content:
Photo submitted by Sophie Mourlan, “Here is a nice shot from the Garlaban massif, South of France. Garlaban is a small all year round trail and enduro paradise just above Marseille. Mountains and the sea at the same time! Bike: Trek Fuel EX7 27.5” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Bouches-du-Rhône, France appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
